reporting-org.narrative: Association for Reproductive and Family Health

description.narrative: The project start-up meeting was conducted from 9th to 12th of September 2012 at the conference hall of Summit Villas Suites, Abuja, Nigeria. This activity marked formal take-off of project implementation. The main purpose of the workshop was to provide space for deepening understanding of project amongst project staff, in terms of design, key outputs, strategies, scope and expected roles of each partner organization. A total of 24 staff of the implementing partners participated in the 4-days workshop.

activity-date.narrative: This activity for a four days process which commenced on 9th September and ended on 14th September 2012
